{{also|nummer}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Numero|g=f|g2=n}} {{i|dated}} * {{alter|de|Nr.||abbreviation}} * {{alter|de|No.||dated abbreviation}} ===Etymology=== From earlier {{m|de|Numero}}, from {{der|de|it|numero}}, from {{der|de|la|numerus||number}}. The feminine gender is probably due to the influence of {{m|de|Zahl||number}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈnʊmɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Nummer.ogg|Audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Nummer.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ʊmɐ}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Nummern|Nümmerchen}} # [[number]]; {{non-gloss definition|see usage notes below}} # [[issue]] (of a magazine, etc.) # {{lb|de|slightly|_|informal}} [[size]] (of shoes or clothes) # [[song]]; [[composition]] (chiefly of [[easy listening]]) # [[act]]; [[stunt]]; [[shtick]] # {{lb|de|colloquial}} [[character]] {{gloss|idiosyncratic person}} # {{lb|de|slang}} [[sex]]; an instance of sexual intercourse ====Usage notes==== * The German word for ''an abstract entity used to describe quantity'', or a symbol thereof, is {{m|de|Zahl}}. A ''Zahl'' is only called a ''Nummer'' when it is used as a means of identification, e.g. in a ranking list, as a phone number, a model number, etc. ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|n}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|auf Nummer sicher gehen}} * {{l|de|eine Nummer zu groß für jemanden}} * {{l|de|nummerieren}} * {{l|de|Nummernschild}} * {{l|de|Ordnungsnummer}} ====Descendants==== {{top2}} * {{desc|da|nummer|bor=1}} * {{desc|et|number|bor=1}} * {{desc|is|númer|bor=1}} * {{desc|dsb|numer|bor=1}} * {{desc|no|-|bor=1}} {{l|nb|nummer}} * {{desc|pl|numer|bor=1}} * {{desc|stq|Nummer|bor=1}}, {{l|stq|Nuumer}} * {{desc|sv|nummer|bor=1}} {{bottom}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:DWDS}} * {{R:Duden}} {{topics|de|Textual division|Numbers}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|lb|Nummero}} ===Etymology=== Ultimately from {{der|lb|la|numerus}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈnumɐ/}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|f}} # [[number]] {{gloss|of identification}} # [[telephone number]] # [[issue]], [[edition]] # [[act]], [[routine]], [[performance]] # [[size]] {{gloss|of clothing}} # {{lb|lb|colloquial}} [[character]] {{gloss|idiosyncratic person}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|lb|Telefonsnummer}} ====See also==== * {{l|lb|Zuel}}
